languages.text: {n}Что-то — или многозначительный тон, или многообещающий взгляд — заставляют культиста повести себя так же, как до того реагировали {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}сотни запуганных вами пешек{/d}. Он опускает голову и трусливо пятится прочь от вас.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то — или многозначительный тон, или многообещающий взгляд — заставляют культиста повести себя так же, как до того реагировали {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}сотни запуганных вами пешек{/d}. Он опускает голову и трусливо пятится прочь от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the ill-boding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the hundreds of pawns you have intimidated. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the ill-boding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the ill-boding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

{n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etwas – dein bedeutsamer Tonfall oder dein unheilschwangerer Blick – lässt den Kultisten ebenso reagieren wie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Hunderte andere Handlanger, die du schon eingeschüchtert hast{/d}. Er senkt den Kopf und weicht zurück, Feigling, der er ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas – dein bedeutsamer Tonfall oder dein unheilschwangerer Blick – lässt den Kultisten ebenso reagieren wie Hunderte anderer Handlanger, die du schon eingeschüchtert hast. Er senkt den Kopf und weicht zurück, Feigling, der er ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Que ce soit votre ton sérieux ou la lueur menaçante de votre regard, le cultiste réagit comme les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}centaines d'autres pions que vous avez intimidés avant lui{/d}. Il baisse la tête et recule, la queue entre les jambes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Que ce soit votre ton sérieux ou la lueur de mauvais augure dans votre regard, le cultiste réagit comme les centaines d'autres pions que vous avez intimidés avant lui. Il baisse la tête et recule, la queue entre les jambes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不知是由于你意味深长的语气，还是你不怀好意的眼神，这个邪教徒赶紧低下了头，朝后退去。他战战兢兢的样子，就像其他{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}成百上千个曾被你吓得屁滚尿流的小角色{/d}一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不知是你意味深长的语气，还是你不怀好意的眼神，让这个邪教徒赶紧低下了头，朝后退去。他战战兢兢的样子，就像其他成百上千个曾被你吓得屁滚尿流的小角色一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}何かが…あなたの意味ありげな口調か、あるいはその不吉なまなざしによるものかわからないが、狂信者に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}これまで脅かしてきた幾百もの雑兵たち{/d}と同じような反応を取らせた。彼は頭を下げ、臆病者のように後ずさる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何かがーーあなたの意味ありげな口調か、その不吉なまなざしによるものかわからないがーー魔女団に、これまで脅かしてきた幾百の手駒たちと同じような反応を取らせた。彼は頭を下げ、臆病者のように後ずさる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hay algo, ya sea tu tono elocuente o la mirada imponente de tus ojos, que provoca que el cultista reaccione igual que los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}cientos de individuos que has intimidado antes{/d}. Baja la cabeza y retrocede como el cobarde que es.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay algo, ya sea tu tono elocuente o la siniestra mirada de tus ojos, que provoca que el cultista reaccione igual que los cientos de individuos que has intimidado antes. Baja la cabeza y retrocede como el cobarde que es.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir şey... Ya manidar ses tonun ya da gözlerindeki tehditkâr bakış, tarikatçının da {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}gözünü korkuttuğun diğer yüzlerce emir kuluyla{/d} aynı tepkiyi vermesine neden oluyor. Başını öne eğip korkağın teki olduğunu kanıtlarcasına geri çekiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your meaningful tone or the forbidding look in your eyes — causes the cultist to react the same way as the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}hundreds of other pawns you have intimidated{/d}. He lowers his head and backs off like the coward he is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir şey... Ya manidar ses tonun ya da gözlerindeki tehditkâr bakış, tarikatçının da gözünü korkuttuğun diğer yüzlerce piyonla aynı tepkiyi vermesine neden oluyor. Başını öne eğip korkağın teki olduğunu kanıtlarcasına geri çekiliyor.{/n}
